name: Gina's Lemon Pepper Chicken
author: Gina Fillippi
summary: This is actually a very easy and fast dish. I 'came across' this a few years back by just experimenting. Hope you enjoy it as much as I do! It is great with a tossed salad, or with tater tots and a vegetable. Bon Appetit!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place chicken in a lightly greased 9x13 inch baking dish
Season with lemon pepper, garlic powder and onion powder to taste
Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes
Turn over chicken pieces and add more seasoning to taste
Bake for an additional 15 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through and juices run clear
